forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 5pm. Partly sunny. High near 85, with temperatures falling to around 74 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 23 mph, with gusts as high as 43 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy. Low around 36, with temperatures rising to around 38 overnight. Northwest wind 5 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 37 mph. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
